pull_request.title: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support (take II)

update.description:
Continuation of work done by @seanyen-msft in [the previous PR](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/704/upgrade-windows-dependencies-for-gazebo/diff). Most of the details are in the first PR, here is a summary:

* target gazebo9 branch 
* update to msvc2017
* refresh some dependencies: FreeImage, boost, qt and ogre.
* change dependencies location to use always [http://gazebosim.org/distributions/](http://gazebosim.org/distributions/)
* split the script for gazebo8 to keep the this version working with previous commands.

Tested for gazebo9 branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2430)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2430/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2430/))

Tested for gazebo8 branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64&build=195)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os\_windows/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/195/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/195/))
update.title: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support (take II)

pull_request.title: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support (take II)

pullrequest.title: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support (take II)

content.raw: I’ve enable the msvc setup again in [7c02298](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/7c0229825b4e777c946c14a1875283a66e5f0228?at=default) . That seems to fix the problem with the compiler path. To avoid waste of time when removing/installing vcpkg packages I’ve changed the remove of them but enable/disable the vcpkg integration \(injection of path in msbuild projects\), [seems to work fine](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2436/).
content.html: I’ve enable the msvc setup again in 7c02298 . That seems to fix the problem with the compiler path. To avoid waste of time when removing/installing vcpkg packages I’ve changed the remove of them but enable/disable the vcpkg integration (injection of path in msbuild projects), seems to work fine.

content.raw: thanks for checking. Looks like we can not remove the [vcvarsall call](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/722/upgrade-windows-dependencies-for-gazebo/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/lib/generic-default-devel-windows.batF43) . Patching it now.
content.html: thanks for checking. Looks like we can not remove the vcvarsall call . Patching it now.

content.raw:
Really exited to see this progress! Hope this one will get through soon.  
  
Just FYI, to really make the Gazebo usable for ROS \(on Windows\), I have more changes for Gazebo. :slight_smile:   
[https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/gazebo9\_9.5.0\_windowsgazebo9\_9.5.0#diff](https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/gazebo9_9.5.0_windows%0Dgazebo9_9.5.0#diff)
content.html:
Really exited to see this progress! Hope this one will get through soon.

Just FYI, to really make the Gazebo usable for ROS (on Windows), I have more changes for Gazebo.
https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/gazebo9_9.5.0_windows gazebo9_9.5.0#diff

I’ve reverted the change in the ign-transport script \(I think that gazebo9 is not using it\) in d500ddc. Tested:

**gazebo8:**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64&build=196)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/196/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/196)\)

**gazebo9:**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2431)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2431/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2431)\)
content.html:
I’ve reverted the change in the ign-transport script (I think that gazebo9 is not using it) in d500ddc. Tested:

gazebo8:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/196/)

gazebo9:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2431/)
